document_title: Improper verification of the user certificate's chain of trust in FortiGate when connecting to SSL-VPN

note.text: An improper following of a certificate's chain of trust vulnerability in FortiGate SSL-VPN may allow an LDAP user to connect to VPN with any certificate that is signed by a trusted Certificate Authority.
note.title: Summary

note.text: FortiGate version 6.4.2 to 6.4.4.FortiGate versions 5.6.x, 6.0.x and 6.2.x, 6.4.0 and 6.4.1 are NOT impacted by this vulnerability.
note.title: Affected Products

note.text: Please upgrade to FortiGate Version 7.0.0.Please upgrade to FortiGate Version 6.4.5 or above.
note.title: Solutions

acknowledgment.description: Fortinet is pleased to thank María Teresa Muñoz Blanco from Vectoritcgroup for reporting this vulnerability under responsible disclosure.
